Getting Started
Welcome to Continue
Copy page

Create, run, and automate AI agents across Mission Control, terminal, and CI/CD

â€‹
Mission Control
Central dashboard for managing Agents, Tasks, Workflows, and Integrations.
Create a Task
Trigger your Agent with a prompt, tools, and rules to complete a specific job.
â€¢ Run manually or from your Inbox
â€¢ Reuse and share with teammates
Set up a Workflow
Schedule recurring Tasks or connect webhooks to trigger Agents automatically.
â€¢ Cron or webhook-based triggers
â€¢ Ideal for daily audits or status checks
â€‹
Integrations
Connect Continue to your existing developer tools to power Tasks and Workflows.
GitHub
Enable repository access for Agents to read and create PRs.
Slack
Mention @Continue in Slack to trigger Agents and receive updates.
Sentry
Automatically generate PRs to fix new issues from Sentry alerts.
Snyk
Detect and fix security vulnerabilities automatically.
You can go to Mission Control Integrations for the full list of tools you can connect, or for more information see the docs page.
â€‹
Continue CLI
Terminal-native AI coding assistance with TUI and headless modes.
npm
yarn
pnpm
Copy
Ask AI
npm i -g @continuedev/cli

TUI Mode
Interactive terminal interface for development workflows
â€¢ Automate builds & refactoring
â€¢ Pre-commit hooks & scripted fixes
â€¢ Terminal-first development
Headless Mode
Automated AI coding for CI/CD and server environments
â€¢ Run in CI/CD pipelines
â€¢ Batch processing & bulk operations
â€¢ Server & container deployments
â€‹
IDE Extensions
Optional IDE extensions for real-time code editing and assistance.
VS Code
Install from VS Code Marketplace Real-time coding assistance and refactoring
JetBrains
Install from JetBrains Plugin Repository Community supported for autocomplete and multi-file edits
â€‹
Resources

Connect GitHub, Slack, Sentry, and Snyk to power your automations.

Getting Started

Welcome to Continue

Create, run, and automate AI agents across Mission Control, terminal, and CI/CD

â€‹
Mission Control

Central dashboard for managing Agents, Tasks, Workflows, and Integrations.

Create a Task

Trigger your Agent with a prompt, tools, and rules to complete a specific job.â€¢ Run manually or from your Inbox
â€¢ Reuse and share with teammates

Set up a Workflow

Schedule recurring Tasks or connect webhooks to trigger Agents automatically.â€¢ Cron or webhook-based triggers
â€¢ Ideal for daily audits or status checks

â€‹
Integrations

Connect Continue to your existing developer tools to power Tasks and Workflows.

GitHub

Enable repository access for Agents to read and create PRs.

Slack

Mention @Continue in Slack to trigger Agents and receive updates.

Sentry

Automatically generate PRs to fix new issues from Sentry alerts.

Snyk

Detect and fix security vulnerabilities automatically.
You can go to Mission Control Integrations for the full list of tools you can connect, or for more information see the docs page.

â€‹
Continue CLI

Terminal-native AI coding assistance with TUI and headless modes.
Copy
Ask AI
npm i -g @continuedev/cli

TUI Mode

Interactive terminal interface for development workflowsâ€¢ Automate builds & refactoring
â€¢ Pre-commit hooks & scripted fixes
â€¢ Terminal-first development

Headless Mode

Automated AI coding for CI/CD and server environmentsâ€¢ Run in CI/CD pipelines
â€¢ Batch processing & bulk operations
â€¢ Server & container deployments

â€‹
IDE Extensions

Optional IDE extensions for real-time code editing and assistance.

VS Code

Install from VS Code Marketplace Real-time coding assistance and refactoring

JetBrains

Install from JetBrains Plugin Repository Community supported for autocomplete and multi-file edits

â€‹
